subject: California Chrome (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: California Chrome, the winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes last year, is heading to England, having been confirmed as a runner in the prestigious Royal Ascot meeting in June.
snippet: California Chrome, the winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes last year, is heading to England, having been confirmed as a runner in the prestigious Royal Ascot meeting in June.
